name: LGBTQ Student Services
description: LGBTQ Student Services is the only completely integrated school-based program of its size and collaborates with both other SFUSD programs and community-based organizations, to make schools safer for all students, including LGBTQ students. Go here for a complete list of services provided: https://www.sfusd.edu/lgbtq-student-services/what-we-do
fullDescription: LGBTQ Student Services is the only completely integrated school-based program of its size and collaborates with both other SFUSD programs and community-based organizations, to make schools safer for all students, including LGBTQ students. Go here for a complete list of services provided: https://www.sfusd.edu/lgbtq-student-services/what-we-do

howToGetIt: Send email to LGBTQ Student Services, Student and Family Services Division: LGBTQ@sfusd.edu
